name: InvasiveGroupAStreptococcusDisordersSNOMED
title: Invasive Group A Streptococcus (Disorders) (SNOMED)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has Invasive Group A Streptococcus regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: Invasive Group A Streptococcus),(Exclusion Criteria: none)

concept.display: Bronchopneumonia caused by Group A Streptococcus (disorder)
Septic shock co-occurrent with acute organ dysfunction due to Group A streptococcus (disorder)
Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction due to Group A streptococcus (disorder)
Congenital group A hemolytic streptococcal pneumonia (disorder)
Invasive Group A beta-hemolytic streptococcal disease (disorder)
Pneumonia caused by infection caused by Streptococcus pyogenes (disorder)
Necrotizing fasciitis caused by Streptococcus pyogenes (disorder)
Sepsis of neonate caused by Streptococcus pyogenes (disorder)
Sepsis of fetus caused by Streptococcus pyogenes (disorder)
